```{r echo=FALSE, fig.align="center", fig.height=3.5}
x  <- seq(-4, 4, 0.1)
y1 <-  1 / (1 + exp(-x))
y2 <- 0*y1

# Boundaries
plot(x, y1, ylim=c(0,1), type = "l", ylab = "y")
lines(x, y2, col = 2)

# Fillin Boundaries
polygon(c(x, rev(x)), c(y2, rev(y1)), col = "lightgreen", density=10, angle=45)
```



```{r}
x  <- seq(-4, 4, 0.05)
y1 <-   1 / (1 + exp(-x))
y2 <- 0.2*sin(x)

# Lines
plot(x, y1, type = "l", ylim = c(1, 10), ylab = "y")
lines(x, y2, col = 2)

# Fill area between lines
polygon(c(x, rev(x)), c(y2, rev(y1)), col = "darkgreen",density = 10, angle = 45)
```

```{r}
x <- seq(-4, 4, 0.05)
y1 <-  sin(x)+8
y2 <- 0.5*sin(x)+4

# Lines
plot(x, y1, type = "l", ylim = c(1, 10), ylab = "y")
lines(x, y2, col = 2)

# Fill area between lines
polygon(c(x, rev(x)), c(y2, rev(y1)), col = "darkgreen",density = 10, angle = 45)

```
